channel.title: Service on El Pudu: Living and working from our Airstream
channel.description: Recent content in Service on El Pudu: Living and working from our Airstream

item.title: Hiawatha NF Rapid River
item.description: Burning Field This camp is in Hiawatha National Forest outside of Rapid River, MI. It’s right off of the main road and we camped only a short distance in on the forest service road. This lead to a bit of traffic, but really only like 5 people total. It made for an easy spot on our way from Denver to NH. The spot we were at had very little signal (like 2 bars of 4g) that we were able to improve to about 20/10mbit service with the booster.
